topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54332dfa6368724bc9500100#post_54332dfa6368724bc9500100
That is how McDonalds are built. They are protrusions into our dimension of a great beast of unfathomable size and endless hunger, blighting all things by its simple existence. The only way for it to be kept in check is through sacrifice of countless cattle and the broken dreams of all who work there.

topics.body:
you know whats funny.

was actually checking some DG interviews.

stefan is introvertive as fuck, like he is just scared to talk to the camera, in all the interviews they have done, he has only talked once, and it was a mumbling type of voice, while looking down to the floor, only 1 sentence.

then he gets on stage, takes his shirt off and acts like a maniac threatening to saw your face of with a rusty saw and dropping a cinder block on your face while screaming at the top of his lungs.
